The patient has a family history of breast cancer in her maternal aunt at age 64 and type II diabetes mellitus in her father. Her mammogram results are shown in Figure A. A biopsy of the lesion is obtained and sent for pathology, which confirms invasive ductal carcinoma. The results from fluorescence in situ hybridization (FISH) testing for HER2-neu expression are shown in Figure B. Lumpectomy with sentinel lymph node biopsy is subsequently performed with negative margins and nodes.
